name: The Climb Home
description:
Go an a journey to climb the mountain and save the egg!

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
S - Pick Up and Lay down Egg
E - Interact
Enter - Restart

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/the-climb-home
